title: Cheese Ceremony
description: The best ceremony of the con.

changedFrom.title: Cheese Ceremony
changedFrom.description: The best ceremony of the con.

title: Party Bus - Meet & Greet
description: Party bus trip. People buy tickets for 15euro at a specified time. They claim ticket from either Con Ops or at the hotel reception prior to departure. People get in the bus to meet and drink with new or old friends! There will be alcohol, snacks and non-alcoholic drinks for people. There will be 4 journeys, each of them being 1hour + 30mins long. We then have 30 minutes to have the guests to get off the bus and claim their patch. The rest of the time before next departure is to refill some alcohols and clean the bus briefly (bottles, trash and bigger spills/stains).

title: Opening Ceremony
description: The Opening Ceremony welcomes everyone and sets the mood for the con, introduces the GoH, NorthernLight, Charity and the hotel and gives useful information to the attendees. Opening ceremony starts off with a show that involved a stage performance by fursuiters has several projected videos and music and ends with an announcement to seemlessly transion to Ethans event for those attending their first furry con.

title: So This Is Your First Furry Con?
description: A presentation (45 minutes, perhaps a bit more) of dos and don'ts for those attending their first furry convention.

title: Role Play Game Meet and Greet
description: A general meet and greet for folks interested in Tabletop Role Play Games

title: Eurovision fans meet and greet
description: A place for fans of the Eurovision Song Contest to meet and chat while watching Eurovision videos.

title: Meet the charity
description: I will show the charities to people.

title: NordicFuzzCon RPG Gaming Track
description:
Following the success of the Dungeons and Dragons game last year NordicFuzzCon are expanding the role playing game track to include several game systems and settings.

Whether you are a seasoned roleplayer or are just interested to try out tabletop role playing games there is something for you. The Gaming team and helpers will be running a number of sessions over the period of the convention suitable for anyone, from dungeon delving to star wars space adventure!

Check out the details and sign up for games here - https://www.nordicfuzzcon.org/Program/TabletopRPGs

title: Dutch Angel Dragon species panel
description: This panel is for everyone who is interested in the species called Dutch Angel Dragon. Whether you are already familiar with these creatures or not, we invite you all to come and enjoy yourself. Meet other members of this community or simply find out why they have nothing to do with the netherlands. Have fun and get answers to your questions from an official species moderator.

title: Cubfur meet & greet
description: Meet & greet for cubs, caretakers, and others interested

title: Fursuit Friendly dance
description: A dance with Fursuit friendly music and a lot of cooling.

description:
The Café returns yet again! Our lovely maids and butlers will be happy to serve you again! There will be fika, hugs and plenty of company! This year, we also have a proper coffee machine!

15-19 Friday
13-17 Saturday

title: Secret Santa
description: First of all, what is a secret santa and why are we doing this? Well, a secret santa is like a big gift exchange! There are multiple versions of it, but the thing we will do to keep things simple, is that everyone turns in a gift, then, when it’s time for everyone to unbox their gift, each and everyone will have recieved a ticket with a number on (also used as proof of you turning a gift in) When you get to pick a package, it will be like a big lottery! But everyone will get something!

title: Lottery draw
description: This is the big Lottery draw for all of those who have bought lottery tickets!

title: Closing Ceremony
description: The Closing Ceremony ends the convention with a bang and introduces next years theme (and other things). It consists of a show part, goodbyes to GoH, Charity annoucement, awards and prizes, attendance statistics and a final announcement for next years con. It will then transition seamlessly to Ethans Feedback sessions starting right after the event.

title: Yard Sale
description: Yard Sale is where we sell off Decorations we (theming) don't want to keep.
